name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Network Engineer with a proven track record in Network Virtualization, Network Automation, and Network Security, bringing 13+ years of experience in high-performance application environments. Adept in managing and implementing solutions across Cisco, HPE Aruba, Dell EMC, and Extreme Networks technologies, ensuring robust LAN, WLAN, and Core Network infrastructures.
Demonstrated ability in project management and delivering customer service excellence while fostering strong teamwork and communication skills among cross-functional teams. Original strengths include extensive knowledge in deploying cloud-native systems and compliance-driven development, enriched by a robust technical understanding of AI/ML platforms. Committed to leveraging extensive networking expertise to enhance system efficiencies and security.

experience.responsibilities:
Implemented advanced **network security** solutions for **Cisco**, **HPE Aruba**, and **Dell EMC** equipment, ensuring robust protection across **LAN**, **WLAN**, and **datacenter networks**.
Managed and automated complex **network virtualization** projects to enhance operational efficiency and scalability using **Extreme Networks** technology.
Delivered end-to-end project management for **network automation** initiatives, achieving a **30% reduction** in downtime and improved service delivery metrics.
Executed **NAC solutions** to fortify **core networks** with identity-based policies, resulting in a **25% improvement** in overall security posture.
Conducted comprehensive **network assessments** and implemented necessary configurations to maintain high reliability in projects valued at over **$1M**.
Fostered strong communication and teamwork within cross-functional groups, ensuring seamless collaboration on critical projects involving **network architecture optimization**.
Provided exceptional customer service and technical support, resolving **95%** of issues within the first call, significantly enhancing client satisfaction.
Documented and presented technical solutions to stakeholders, leveraging strong **communication skills** to align expectations and project goals effectively.

Implemented **network automation** solutions to optimize performance across **LAN** and **WLAN** environments, achieving a **30%** reduction in network downtime.
Designed and maintained **NAC solutions** to enhance **network security**, ensuring compliance and swift threat detection for over **500 users** in various locations.
Managed and upgraded core networking infrastructure, utilizing equipment from **Cisco**, **HPE Aruba**, and **Dell EMC**, resulting in a **40%** increase in overall bandwidth availability.
Oversaw **project management** for the deployment of **datacenter networks**, coordinating a cross-functional team to successfully launch a new service within **3 months** of project initiation.
Conducted comprehensive network performance evaluations and provided customer service solutions to troubleshoot issues, maintaining an **average response time** of less than **2 hours** for all support requests.
Collaborated with team members to implement **network virtualization** strategies, improving resource allocation and management efficiency within the organization.
Fostered strong communication skills among the team, facilitating knowledge sharing that improved collective problem-solving capabilities and enhanced overall teamwork.

Managed and optimized **network security** and **network automation** strategies for enterprise-level infrastructure, ensuring high availability and performance across **LAN**, **WLAN**, and **datacenter networks**.
Executed **project management** initiatives to streamline deployment and maintenance of **Cisco**, **HPE Aruba**, and **Dell EMC** networking solutions, enhancing system reliability by **30%**.
Designed and implemented **NAC solutions** to enforce security policies across the network, significantly reducing unauthorized access incidents by **25%**.
Developed and maintained documentation and training materials to enhance **customer service**, communication skills, and teamwork among technical staff and stakeholders, resulting in a **40%** increase in overall team effectiveness.
Facilitated regular network assessments and evaluations to identify areas for improvement and risk mitigation, employing **Extreme Networks** technology to enhance overall connectivity and responsiveness.
Collaborated cross-functionally with clients to address their networking needs, delivering solutions that consistently met or exceeded project timelines and requirements with a **95% client satisfaction rate**.
Implemented advanced **network virtualization** techniques to improve resource allocation and facilitate better network management, leading to a **20%** reduction in operational costs.
Led training sessions on latest networking technologies and security protocols, enhancing team capabilities in **network security** and fostering a culture of continuous improvement and innovation.
